name: LoopingListIteratorTest
description: Unit tests for the LoopingListIterator class, which tests various functionalities such as adding, removing, resetting, and iterating over elements in a looping manner.

test_cases.name: testAdd
test_cases.description: Tests the add method of LoopingListIterator by adding elements and verifying the order of elements after adding.

test_cases.name: testConstructorEx
test_cases.description: Tests the constructor of LoopingListIterator to ensure it throws a NullPointerException when given a null list.

test_cases.name: testJoggingNotOverBoundary
test_cases.description: Tests jogging back and forth between two elements without crossing the boundary of the list.

test_cases.name: testJoggingOverBoundary
test_cases.description: Tests jogging back and forth between two elements while crossing the boundary of the list.

test_cases.name: testLooping0
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of LoopingListIterator with an empty list, ensuring it correctly handles no elements.

test_cases.name: testLooping1
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of LoopingListIterator with a list containing a single element.

test_cases.name: testLooping2
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of LoopingListIterator with a list containing two elements.

test_cases.name: testNextAndPreviousIndex
test_cases.description: Tests the nextIndex and previousIndex methods of LoopingListIterator.

test_cases.name: testRemovingElementsAndIteratingBackwards
test_cases.description: Tests removing elements from a list while iterating backwards using LoopingListIterator.

test_cases.name: testRemovingElementsAndIteratingForward
test_cases.description: Tests removing elements from a list while iterating forward using LoopingListIterator.

test_cases.name: testReset
test_cases.description: Tests the reset method of LoopingListIterator to ensure it correctly resets the iterator position.

test_cases.name: testSet
test_cases.description: Tests using the set method of LoopingListIterator to change elements in the list.
